name: Soujanya
descriptionLong: Soujanya is a Telugu native speaker. She is from Hyderabad, Telangana, India. She has been teaching Telugu to non-Telugu speaking Indians, so she knows the difficulties of learning a new language along with the solutions.

name: Hitesh Kollipara
descriptionLong:
My name is Hitesh and I am from Andhra Pradesh (India).
I teach Telugu. I am also a published author (Not self-published) in Telugu, have had published three novels and several short stories till to date.
I have been already teaching Telugu to NRIs and foreigners as well as non-Telugu speaking Indians so I knew the difficulties of learning a new language along with solutions.Coming to my teaching method, I will first ask the students about their learning objectives and then tailor-make my lessons according to their needs, goals, and level of understanding. Though my approach is student centric, I normally teach via PPT slides, picture images and using the real time examples. As I am storyteller, I make my students read my stories and help them understand the usage of the same words in different contexts/situations. I also give material at the end of each class so that students can prepare/recollect topics on their own.
